personal.backstory: The dark lady was once a great countess, now a cursed vampire she hides from the daylight and spreads a reign of terror at night.

core.description: A jet of flame shoots from the wizards fingertips burning the primary target any any other characters on the same tile for 1d3 + level of wizard fire damage.
core.name: Burning hands

events.onuse:
from ezdm_libs.util import rolldice
modifier = player.get('/core/combat/level-hitdice', 1)
campaign.message('%s casts %s at %s' % (player.displayname(), item.displayname(), target.displayname()))
loc = target.location()
for char in list(campaign.characterlist):
    if char.location() == loc:
        campaign.message('%s hits %s' % (item.displayname(), char.displayname() ))
        damage_roll=rolldice(numdice=1, numsides=3, modifier=modifier)
        campaign.message(damage_roll[1])
        st = char.saving_throw('spell')
        campaign.message(st[1])
        if st[0]:
            campaign.message('%s successfully save, damage reduced by half' % target.displayname())
            damage = int(damage_roll[0] / 2)
        else:
            damage = damage_roll[0]
        result = char.take_damage(damage)
        campaign.message(result[1])
        campaign.message(char.autosave())

core.description: Fires a bolt of arcane energy at the target, if it hits it does 1d6 damage.
core.name: Magic Misile

events.onfinish:
campaign.warning('%s has finished casting Magic Misile at %s'  % (player.displayname(), target.displayname()))
from ezdm_libs.util import rolldice
spell_success = player.spell_success()
if not spell_success[1]:
	campaign.error(spell_success)
else:
	dmg = rolldice(numdice=1, numsides=6, modifier=1)
	campaign.error(dmg[1])
	result = target.take_damage(dmg[0])
	campaign.error(result[1])
events.onround: campaign.error('%s continues to cast Magic Misile at %s' % (player.displayname(), target.displayname()))
events.onuse: campaign.error('%s is casting Magic Missile at %s' % (player.displayname(), target.displayname()))

core.description: Grants the wizard magical armor equivalent to chainmail but with weight or encumbrance
core.name: Spell Armor

events.onuse:
from ezdm_libs.item import Item
from ezdm_libs.util import load_json
i = Item(load_json('items','magic_armor.json'))
player.acquire_item(i)
player.equip_item(0)
campaign.error('%s is now wearing magic armor' % player.displayname())
player.autosave()

core.description: This is the great sword with which the legendary hero hercules completed his 12 tasks. It is also a Paladin artifact sword.
core.name: Sword of Hercules

core.description: This is the great sword with which the legendary hero hercules completed his 12 tasks. It is also a Paladin artifact sword.
core.name: Sword of Hercules
